title: Lupin III: $1 Money Wars (Lupin III: Missed by a Dollar)
synopsis: Lupin & co. compete with a greedy bank president and her goons to solve the mystery leading to a broach, a treasure said to be behind the success of history's most powerful rulers.
characters: ['Lupin III, Arsene', 'Jigen, Daisuke', 'Mine, Fujiko', 'Ishikawa XIII, Goemon', 'Zenigata, Kouichi', 'Gilbert', 'Craymov, Cynthia', 'Fishbarn, Sandy', 'Auctioneer', 'Nabikov, Alexei']
voices: ['Kurita, Kanichi', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi', 'Masuyama, Eiko', 'Inoue, Makio', 'Naya, Gorou', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Nakata, Jouji']
